thread.title: UPS Pilots Union Calls for Strike Vote
thread.title_full: UPS Pilots Union Calls for Strike Vote - WSJ

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: UPS Pilots Union Calls for Strike Vote
text:
Leaders of the Independent Pilots Association on Wednesday called for a strike against United Parcel Service Inc., amid contract negotiations that have lasted about four years.
The vote on whether to strike, scheduled for Oct. 23, would give the unionâ€™s executive board the authority to request a release from federally mediated negotiations with... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
